text: 37:14 Esekiel 36:27Egh kɨ uan Duam ia danightɨ, ia angamɨra ikiam. Eghtɨ kɨ ua ian aku ian nguazimra mangam, eghtɨ ia an ikɨ deraghvɨra ikiam. Eghtɨ kɨ kamaghɨn damuamin dughiamɨn, ia deraghvɨra fogh suam, kɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God, kɨ kamaghɨn damuasa Akar Gavgavim gami. Guizbangɨra, kɨ dar amuam.”
